des: "My husband and I concocted this one night, and it is so good, I just had to share it!  So ladies if you're into sweet cocktails, this is the one for you!"
ins: Measure the rum, banana liqueur and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker. Add a generous scoop of ice. Cover and shake until the outside is frosty, about 30 seconds. Strain into a glass filled with ice and gently pour the grenadine on top. It should float.
